name: NSLocalizedString Swift
content:
attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_EPISODE", value: "Episode", comment: "Episode label in the metadataview"),     scene?.episode?.completeName() ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Szene", value: "Szene", comment: "Szene label in the metadataview"),       scene?.completeName() ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Einstellung", value: "Einstellung", comment: "Einstellung label in the metadataview"), setup?.completeName() ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Take", value: "Take", comment: "Take label in the metadataview"),        take?.takenumber?.integerValue.toString() ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Projekttag", value: "Projekttag", comment: "Projekttag label in the metadataview"),  clip.projectday?.completeName() ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Camroll", value: "Camroll", comment: "Camroll label in the metadataview"),         clip.camroll ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Clipname", value: "Clipname", comment: "Clipname label in the metadataview"),        clip.clipname ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Winkel", value: "Winkel", comment: "Winkel label in the metadataview"),          clip.angle?.integerValue.toString() ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Blende", value: "Blende", comment: "Blende label in the metadataview"),          clip.blend?.blend ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Objektiv", value: "Objektiv", comment: "Objektiv label in the metadataview"),        clip.lens?.lens ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Magazin", value: "Magazin", comment: "Magazin label in the metadataview"),         clip.magazin?.name ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Hoehe", value: "Höhe", comment: "Höhe label in the metadataview"),            (clip?.height?.height).map { height in "\(height) m" } ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Entfernung", value: "Entfernung", comment: "Entfernung label in the metadataview"),      (clip?.distance?.distance).map { distance in "\(distance) m" } ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Filter", value: "Filter", comment: "Filter label in the metadataview"),          ", ".join(filters)))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Weißabgleich", value: "Weißabgleich", comment: "Weißabgleich label in the metadataview"),    clip.whitebalance?.whitebalance ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_ISO/ASA", value: "ISO/ASA", comment: "ISO/ASA label in the metadataview"),         clip.exposureindexasa?.exposureindexasa ?? ""))
            attributes.append((NSLocalizedString("METADATAVIEW_Belichtungszeit", value: "Belichtungszeit", comment: "Belichtungszeit labe
author: Tim Bodeit
